panels.description: Rate of ingested commands over time
panels.title: Commands Rate

panels.description: Returns a number between 0 and n number of threads on the Y-axis. Thus, if there are 4 threads working, the maximum capacity is 4 if every thread is active 100% of the time.
panels.title: Command Bus Capacity

panels.description: It represent the time needed for a particular handler (command handler) to process/handle message.
panels.title: Command Bus Latency

panels.description: Rate of ingested events over time
panels.title: Events Rate

panels.description: Returns a number between 0 and n number of threads on the Y-axis. Thus, if there are 4 threads working, the maximum capacity is 4 if every thread is active 100% of the time.
panels.title: Event Processor Capacity

panels.description: Event processor timers - Measures the time needed to process Event
panels.title: Event Processor Latency

panels.description: Rate of ingested queries over time
panels.title: Queries Rate

panels.description: Returns a number between 0 and n number of threads on the Y-axis. Thus, if there are 4 threads working, the maximum capacity is 4 if every thread is active 100% of the time.
panels.title: Query Bus Capacity

panels.description: It represent the time needed for a particular handler (query handler) to process/handle message.
panels.title: Query Bus Latency
